quicktutorial_objDesc_tut: Learn the bare basics of playing Zero-K. Follow the provided instructions at each step.
quicktutorial_persistent_assist:
\255\0\255\0\Right click\008 on the factory to \255\255\255\0\assist\008 it. Assist is the most effective way to speed up unit production.

(Make sure your commander is selected)
quicktutorial_persistent_attack:
\255\0\255\0\Right click\008 to \255\255\255\0\attack\008 and destroy the enemy Storage.

(Make sure your units are selected)
quicktutorial_persistent_attack2: Use \255\255\255\0\attack move\008 to \255\255\255\0\destroy all enemies\008 to the right. Select your units, press \255\0\255\0\A\008 and left click to issue an attack move order.
quicktutorial_persistent_boxSelect: You have found three friendly Glaives. Select all your units by \255\0\255\0\left clicking\008 and \255\255\255\0\dragging a box\008 around them.
quicktutorial_persistent_buildFactory:
Build a \255\0\255\255\Cloakbot Factory\008. Your commander can place one factory for free, as shown by the overhead icon.

+ Click the \255\255\255\0\Factory\008 tab in the menu
+ Click the Cloakbot Factory button
+ \255\0\255\0\Left click\008 on the ground to place the building

(Make sure your commander is selected)

TIP: Rotate structures with [ and ], or left click and drag.
quicktutorial_persistent_buildGlaives:
Build five \255\0\255\255\Glaives\008 with your factory.

+ Select your factory
+ \255\0\255\0\Left click\008 the Glaive button five times
quicktutorial_persistent_buildMex:
Build a \255\0\255\255\Metal Extractor\008 on the \255\255\255\0\metal spot\008. This will supply \255\255\255\0\metal\008 needed for construction.

+ Click the \255\255\255\0\Area Mex\008 command
+ \255\0\255\0\Left click\008 on the metal spot

(Make sure your commander is selected)
quicktutorial_persistent_buildSolar:
Build a \255\0\255\255\Solar Collector\008. This will supply \255\255\255\0\energy\008 needed for construction and ability upkeep.

+ Click the \255\255\255\0\Econ\008 tab in the menu
+ Click the Solar Collector button
+ \255\0\255\0\Left click\008 on the ground to place the building

(Make sure your commander is selected. If you accidentally stop the construction, \255\0\255\0\right click\008 the building frame to resume.)
quicktutorial_persistent_camera:
\255\255\255\0\Zoom the camera\008 to your \255\255\255\0\commander\008 to the left.

+ Pan the camera with \255\0\255\0\arrow keys\008, the \255\0\255\0\screen edge\008 or \255\0\255\0\middle mouse\008 button.
+ Zoom with \255\0\255\0\scrollwheel\008 or \255\0\255\0\Page Up and Page Down\008.
quicktutorial_persistent_complete: Well done. You now know the basics of Zero-K.
quicktutorial_persistent_lineMove:
Draw a \255\255\255\0\line formation\008 with the mouse. Move your units into the indicated circles. 

+ \255\0\255\0\Right click\008 and drag to draw a line
+ Release right click

(Make sure all your units are selected)
quicktutorial_persistent_select: Select your commander by \255\0\255\0\left clicking\008 on it.
quicktutorial_persistent_selectMultiple:
\255\0\255\0\Right click\008 on the ground to issue a \255\255\255\0\move\008 command. Move your commander to the marker to the right.

(Make sure your commander is selected)
